Exchanger

Currency Converter in Vanilla JS

1 United States Dollors equals 74.56 Indian Rupees 15 Nov, 12:38 UTC

1 USD = 74.56 INR

1 INR = 0.02 USD

Disclaimer: Coverstion is based upon 3rd party api. please visit here to read more.

Exchanger App

Exchanger app uses external API provided by Fixer.io to convert currency. This uses free version of the API. To get started with this API, all you need to do is get your free API from Fixer.io. Coversion is done by the AJAX request, So no page load require.

Things you need before you get started

  • API Key from fixer.io.
  • Add API key in file /src/js/api.js
  • Run command npm run build
  • Access index.html from /dist folder.
  • You are good to go

Thank you fixer.io for providing free API access.
